description: Call the right model at the right time with the world's most powerful AI model router.

system_message.info: System message to pass to the model.

models.info: Link the models you want to route between.

api_key.info: The Not Diamond API Key to use for routing.

preference_id.info: The ID of the router preference that was configured via the Dashboard.

tradeoff.info: The tradeoff between cost and latency for the router to determine the best LLM for a given query.

hash_content.info: Whether to hash the content before being sent to the NotDiamond API.
